scenario: Agent A, a recent college graduate in astrophysics, lounges in a cozy household with Agent B, a passionate cook, and Agent C, a creative graphic designer. They collectively become engaged with the discovery of a new exoplanet and plan a themed dinner and art night.

actions.description: Agent A invites Agents B and C to form a star-watching group, planning regular sessions on their backyard patio.
Agent A begins drafting a blog post to share the exoplanet discovery with a wider audience, seeking input from Agents B and C for culinary and artistic perspectives.
Agent A suggests a joint grocery shopping trip to buy healthy ingredients for the themed dinner, focusing on dishes that correlate with the exoplanetary theme.
Agent A and Agents B and C decide to create a handcrafted constellation map to decorate their home and deepen their understanding of the skies.
Agent A plans to lead a group search for optimal spots around their neighborhood for clearer views of the night sky, considering light pollution and obstructions.
Agent A takes on preparing the patio for their star-watching sessions by arranging seating and gathering warm blankets to foster a close-knit, comfortable atmosphere.
Agent A gathers and organizes all their space-related materials — books, articles, documentaries — for an informative and engaging discovery session with Agents B and C.
Agent A takes the initiative to learn about astrophotography, aiming to capture their stargazing moments and starry discoveries with a camera.
